https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cDlUjZU7xSZeBkU8RWrPZN5ejHN.jpg A bittersweet comedy infused with Glaswegian resilience and wit, centred on the generations of men knowingly exposed to deadly asbestos over years working in the Glasgow shipyards and the tragic impact left on them and their loved ones. A Mug's Game
